page.title: 08Fishguard Rd.Indust.Est.
page.content:
{A.B.& C. FENCING:_ This fencing company sells wooden, metal and electric fences. {* BANGER * is the name of the hydraulic machine which plants the wooden posts. The electric fences are operated either by battery or mains supply. There is a special wood called {* IRON WOOD * which is insulated but very expensive.
{WITHYBUSH COACHWORKS:_ This workshop mends, sprays and welds parts of cars. They use electricity for hot welding, and gas for cold welding. Old wrecks..crashed cars and vans.. can be made {* AS GOOD AS NEW * The correct mixture of paint for spraying is worked out by...computer!!
